Content: The hotpot at this place is amazing! Highly recommended. Sooooooooo delicious!!
The hotpot ingredients are fresh, and the broth is rich in flavor. So delicious, i love it.
This place serves authentic hotpot with a wide variety of ingredients. I'll be back again.
The hotpot experience at this restaurant was fantastic. Great service too.
The hotpot soup base here is rich and flavorful. Perfect for a cold day. i love it.
